author: GamingBolt
description:
TMNT: Shredder’s Revenge proved just how exciting the 2D beat ‘em up genre can still be. Now the same team is turning things up a notch with a roster chalk-full of Marvel heroes. 

Marvel Cosmic Invasion is a chaotic co-op-heavy brawler packed with retro charm, modern tag-team mechanics, and a huge hero roster. Marvel Cosmic Invasion launches December 1st for PC, PS4, PS5, Switch 1/2, and Xbox Series X/S for just $29.99. 

If its content pipeline is anything like Shredder’s Revenge, expect some extra DLC characters and stages in the near future (my guess is the Fantastic Four).
title: MARVEL Cosmic Invasion -  15 Things You Need To Know Before You Buy

author: GamingBolt
description:
The PlayStation 4 cemented its legacy as one of the greatest consoles ever made, thanks to a catalogue packed with unforgettable adventures, genre-defining epics, and technical showpieces that heavily contributed to moving the medium of gaming forward. 

With well over 117 million units sold, the PS4 became a home for both bold reinventions with titles like Final Fantasy 7 Remake alongside original masterpieces such as Bloodborne, Ghost of Tsushima and many more. This video is about celebrating those titles as we list down 20 of the best games that you can play on the PS4.
title: My 20 Must Play PS4 Games for 2025

author: GamingBolt
description:
Of Ash and Steel is geared primarily for those who enjoy the likes of Gothic, where carefully considering your build and skill unlocks is as important as deciding whether to tackle a group of seemingly harmless enemies. 

Maybe it can shine if its various weaknesses are addressed, but even then, its storytelling, protagonist, world design, and gameplay feel ever-so slightly above average.
title: Of Ash And Steel Review - Is This Open World RPG Worth It?
